title: Planete Bio
description: Small store carries fresh organic fruits and vegetables, vegan refrigerated items including tofu cutlets, deli meats, soy yogurt. Has a small Japanese section that sells tahini sauce, miso paste, seaweed and more. Other products are nut butters, vegan pate, nut milk, soy pudding, superfoods. Gluten free section consists of bread, pasta, cereal and more. Also sells toothpaste, deodorant, oil, medicine, brushes.
